author: felixweber
title: NFT Guild
description: Hay una fricción del Espacio CNFT y del Proyecto Catalizador. La falta de comunicación y de colaboración nos obliga a construir silos.

f6_assessments.q0: Esta propuesta tendrá un impacto en Catalyst, ya que supone una fuente de financiación para un público mayoritariamente "¿Wen Moon?".  Donde podría brillar en el ecosistema general de Cardano es fomentando el intercambio de ideas con proyectos de NFT muy comprometidos para que pasemos del "¿Wen Moon?" al "¡No sabía que se podía hacer ESO con una NFT!".  Catalyst tiene el potencial de ser LA fuerza que impulsa las NFT al siguiente nivel de innovación para los creadores y los participantes del mercado.  Una idea sobre los proyectos específicos de NFT, ya sean nativos de Cardano o que busquen trasladarse desde otra plataforma, sus necesidades y frustraciones con las herramientas existentes, sería una métrica útil para evaluar lo relevante que sería esta propuesta para el problema planteado.  Pero, como mero puente para iniciar la conversación, es un gran comienzo tal y como está.
f6_assessments.q1: El equipo de la propuesta es un conocido grupo de embajadores, constructores y colaboradores de la Comunidad Catalyst.  Han sido financiados con frecuencia a través de Catalyst, y han demostrado las mejores cualidades e intereses de la comunidad en todo momento.  Su organización del Idea Fest, un gran éxito en la incorporación de proponentes, es un fuerte indicador de su capacidad para trabajar con éxito para traer nuevas ideas de la comunidad NFT específicamente, reutilizando y ampliando los formatos y herramientas existentes.  La propuesta no indicaba si tenían un conocimiento particular de los puntos fuertes y la singularidad del potencial de las NFT de Cardano, sin embargo, esto no debería ser necesario para organizar con éxito las reuniones entre los que tienen ese conocimiento y los que tienen curiosidad por el potencial de las CNFT, y la capacidad de Catalyst para ordenar y poner en marcha las ideas.  El calendario, teniendo en cuenta que ya disponen de herramientas, equipos y formatos, es urgente sin ser apresurado, y el presupuesto propuesto está en línea con las propuestas financiadas anteriormente por este equipo.  La probabilidad de éxito es alta.
f6_assessments.q2: Se trata de una propuesta simplemente auditada, ya que su producto será un flujo constante de contenidos disponibles al público que empezará a estar disponible casi inmediatamente en febrero.  No hay actualizaciones programadas hasta el primer evento, pero este grupo mantiene una presencia constante en los medios de comunicación de Catalyst, y nos han mantenido al día de todos sus otros proyectos hasta ahora, y siempre están disponibles y dispuestos a responder a preguntas sobre sus proyectos y progresos.

f6_assessments.q0:
This idea is necessary for inspiring the development of NFT Creators community, which also boosts the development of NFT project in the Cardano ecosystem. In the proposal, the team also mentions the tied relationship between NFT ecosystem and project Catalyst, and that info proves that this event will improve the collaboration between them. Therefore, it strongly impacts on Cardano ecosystem. 
This project also has KPIs & OKRs that will make a big impact on the ecosystem, and of course, align with the challenge givens
f6_assessments.q1:
The leader of this project is well-known in the Catalyst community, he has well connected to CNFT community, and has experience in organizing events with Calalyst team. Moreover, the implementation plan in the proposal is clear for what the team wants to do, going with the clear roadmap for months. Therefore, this proposal absolutely gets high feasibility. 
The budget is used for covering the whole roadmap and detailed in each activity category, all are reasonable.
f6_assessments.q2: The KPIs and roadmap are clear and detailed enough for auditing. The team also has a good acknowledgment about the current situation of the problem through their explanation. And they make a plan to solve it that is very close and lean. All of these info easy to understand for assessing their step to do and goal to get.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea is really fascinating which it adds value to NFT creators, collaborators and business through communication. It also improves the evolution of NFT(s) being only an asset of flippening or creating a mindset of "get rich quick". NFT(s) are more than just being that, and we have seen it grow into a more functional asset! This also includes that the community can innovate together to implement and venture extraordinary insights and experience between each other, which in turn not just adopting new users to the Cardano ecosystem but to plant an innovative signature as a routine in the NFT side of the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The team members are not classified though the idea of the proposal resonated where it said "Regarding the NFT Ecosystem, we see a lot of competition and run for the fast Money". The evolution of NFT(s) is slowly starting to be a more functional and utilitarian asset, and this proposal would be a great way to improve the quality of creators, marketplaces and businesses. Besides NFT Guild YouTube channel, zoom calls and discord, will there be other online platform to increase awareness of the proposing subject? A more detailed metrics to what extent of number of participants can be achieved, potential collaborators and types of held events will be helpful to foresee the success of this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Though I believe its the funding required is reasonable, and milestones given are achievable, it would be helpful if there are few important key points that could be listed. Firstly, how does the budget will be allocated for each biweekly events. Secondly, essential key points on how to have great outreach and marketing campaign with the budget given. Lastly, a list of potential of well established and experienced projects from the Catalyst ecosystem (to back the point of the proposal feasibility).

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is clear and the objectives of the proposal are clear in terms of how the NFT Guild would assist in building a stronger line of comunication between CNFT Space and Project Catalyst. However there is some key information missing such as the team behind this. The proposal could be strengthened through the inclusion of some suggested topics for discussion to open communication lines between the disparate groups even if it was done as an example for how the two ecosystems of CNFT and Catalyst could begin to open that conversation.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer has indicated connection to however no specific commitment has come from established groups within the Cardano community such as Catalyst Swarm, Eastern Town Hall, Catalyst School, Ambassadors Guild and the Bridge Builders Guild. It's therefore unclear if this project seeks to leverage these already established initiatives to bring greater awarness about Cardano to the CNFT space - or indeed if it is about creating additional work that would lead to a greater understanding. The reporting mechanism within the monthly Catalyst Town Halls would likely mitigate or steer any project creep away from the intended mission. 


There is a clear budget and timeline inlcuded in the proposal with a proposed amount of 500USD per event over a three month period. Given the scope of this project is lacking specificity it is hard to determine if this is an appropriate amount for the work and/or if this is split across the many initiatives that would contribute to the development?
f6_assessments.q2: There are clear KPI's included in the project scope and community can audit the project through the monthly reporting feature as previously mentioned. Again - no specificity around the size of the market, the number of events that the project is seeking to hold and therefor what success looks like in terms of people engaged and number of events delivered, quality assessment of the discussions and potential onboarding of projects to the next Catalyst fund.

f6_assessments.q0: The goal of the proposal is within the challenge settings. However, I recommend goals and key metrics to have their own separate section in the proposal for easy identification. The proposal would promote Cardano when implemented since it seeks to remove the conflict between the CNFT space and Project Catalyst.
f6_assessments.q1:
I believe the team possess the skills and experience to execute the proposal considering the fact that they partook in earlier Project Catalyst and others. The budget is well presented. The plan of the proposal is detailed and reasonable enough to achieve the goal.
However, possible risks/challenges involved in the implementation of the proposal are not outlined.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposer has provided a plan, timeline and milestones for the achievement of the proposal. It is good that KPIs that define success the success of the proposal are outlined.
From the problem statement section, the targeted problem is clearly described.

f6_assessments.q0: Great idea. The project seeks to build collaboration with others within the catalyst ecosystem. It would be great to establish at least one partnership with any collaborator, say Catalyst School, since it is stated within the proposal that, they would take the educating aspect.
f6_assessments.q1: I think this is achievable however, other detail in the proposal is dependent on stakeholders with whom you have no established partnership.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal involves documentation and recording that I believe is transparent and easily trackable.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal has a clear definition of its problem statement and it tends to proffer the solutions. The idea to foster a platform event to collaborate issues of concern as it relates to NFT community and Project Catalyst with aim to providing solutions to challenges and creating a common front and standards or values in the NFT community in Cardano Ecosystem. The proposal provides a collaborative process that is really in the NFT community.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal did not provide any information on the main team but its well detailed collaborative efforts  with other experienced, active and committed community members and events, it is very likely that that the proposal poised to be a success. Given the detailed budget and its deployments coupled with its comprehensive roadmaps, it is my opinion that the project is in the right hands.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has provided enough metrics to assess the performance of the project in addition to the detailed roadmaps and plans to ensure their activities will be made easily accessible to the community to judge its progress.

solution: Ofrecer eventos comunitarios con Focus on NFT Creators y Markeplaces donde las ideas puedan encontrar un lugar común para reunirse y conectar con Catalyst
experience: Creadores de NFT y fabricantes de herramientas, SPOs, miembros de la comunidad CNFT bien conectados, proponentes financiados y asesores de la comunidad, embajadores de Cardano
